rules: Manuscripts must be original and not under consideration elsewhere.
All manuscripts are subjected to a double-blind reviewing process (anonymized).
Separate title page with author details, bio, and acknowledgement.
Word count: 5000 - 8000 words (MS Word format). Abstract: Max 200 words.
Format: Times New Roman, 12pt, British/American spelling.
Evaluation criteria: Readability, literature use, method appropriateness, data significance.
Submission via email to jopsa@psa.com (copy jopsa@gmail.com).
No submission/publication fees. Voluntary donations to GAMIP accepted.
plagiarism_policy: Strict peer-review. Similarity index > 20% results in immediate decline.
copyright_policy: Copyright remains with the author(s). Permission required for reproduction.
